title: Sampaio Corrêa Futebol e Esporte
text:
Sampaio Corrêa Futebol e Esporte, commonly known as Sampaio Corrêa, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Saquarema">Saquarema</a>, <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro%20%28state%29">Rio de Janeiro state</a>.
History.
The club was founded on February 20, 2006. Sampaio Corrêa won the <a href="Campeonato%20Carioca%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Carioca Third Level</a> in 2009.
Stadium.
Sampaio Corrêa Futebol e Esporte play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Elcyr%20Resende%20de%20Mendon%C3%A7a">Estádio Elcyr Resende de Mendonça</a>. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 10,000 people.
